Firestarter:





The talon-shaped craft undocked from the cloaked space station, the cloak of 
the craft soon turning off.

<Firestarter> the comm blared.

"Yes?"

<Find our two generals on Earth.  Assess the situation, and report back to us 
via long range satellite communication.  If project Con-Alpha is completed, 
aid them to the best of your abilities until reinforcements arrive.  If it 
isn't, decide on how close they are to finishing their task and do as your 
judgement deems fit>

"As you command." 

<Excellent.  We expect nothing but the best>

Firestarter's Talon-Class starfighter activated its transwarp engines, 
launching into a transwarp portal heading for Earth from a star system not to 
far from Earth.
